dogBreeds.friendliness: High with children and other animals
dogBreeds.description: Labrador Retrievers are friendly and outgoing. They are known for their intelligence and versatility. Labs may be prone to hip dysplasia, a genetic issue affecting their health and lifespan.

dogBreeds.description: German Shepherds are loyal and protective. They excel in various roles, including police and service work. Hip dysplasia is a genetic concern for this breed.

dogBreeds.description: Bulldogs are docile and friendly. They have a distinctive appearance. Due to their brachycephalic nature, they may have respiratory issues affecting their health and lifespan.
